page.title: 05HAILSHAM LEISURE CENTRE 1
page.content:
The Hailsham{Leisure Centre}was built in 1982. It has facilities for ball games such as squash, short tennis, indoor football and basketball. There are also facilities for gymnastics, keep fit and archery.
The Leisure Centre has not yet got a swimming pool, but planning for one has already begun and it should be opened in 1987.
The Leisure Centre is one of Hailsham's greatest assets and most people think that the pool will improve it a great deal. It is conveniently placed behind the shopping centre so that anyone can pop in and watch, or take part in one of the varied activities.
